cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 495 mi (795 km) E of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Turning northwest then west-southwest, tracking toward the northwestern Bahamas and the east coast of Florida
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: east-central Florida coast (near Volusia/Brevard County line)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch – Volusia/Brevard County line FL to Hallandale Beach FL and the northwestern Bahamas; Storm Surge Watch – Altamaha Sound GA to Hallandale Beach FL; Tropical Storm Watch – Altamaha Sound GA to Volusia/Brevard County line FL and Hallandale Beach FL to north of Ocean Reef
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas, east and southeast Florida coast, and portions of the southeast U.S. coastline
weather_observation.wind: Only occasional breezy trade-wind showers; tropical-storm-force winds not expected in San Juan, PR
weather_observation.rainfall: None significant; heaviest rain confined to Bahamas and Florida
